minesweeper

Class Cell

  • java.lang.Object
    • minesweeper.Cell

  • public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds the properties of an actual Minesweeper cell. These properties include the mine count, whether or not it's a mine, whether or not the cell has been flagged, and lastly whether or not the cell has been clicked on.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Matthew Shampine, Connor Dudas

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Cell()
      Constructor that instantiates a new cell and sets up the cell with default properties.
